translation: There is no man on his feet.
In the whole of God's world!
There's a poster on the rope:
All power to the Constituent Assembly!
The old lady's crying her eyes out,
He can't figure out what it means,
What a poster like this is referring to,

text: Сколько бы вышло портянок для ребят,
translation: That'd be a lot of knick-knacks for the boys,
Somehow I made it over the snowdrift.
Oh, the Bolsheviks will drive you into a coffin!
The frost isn't far behind either!
And the bourgeois at the crossroads
I tucked my nose into my collar.
And he's talking in a half-voice:
By the side of a snowdrift....
That it's not fun these days,
Do you remember how it used to be
There's a lady in a scribbler
We cried, we cried, we cried.....
Pull it up, pull it up!
All power to the Constituent Assembly ...
This is the building right here...

text: На время  десять, на ночь  двадцать пять...
translation: For the time being ten, for the night twenty-five.....

text: И меньше  ни с кого не брать...

translation: The wind blows, the snow flutters.
A cigarette in his teeth, a crumpled cartouche,

text: На спину б надо бубновый туз!
translation: You should have an ace of diamonds on your back!

text: А Ванька с Катькой  в кабаке...
translation: And Vanya and Katya in the pub...

text: У ей керенки есть в чулке!
translation: She's got some money in her stocking!

text: Был Ванька наш, а стал солдат!
translation: Vanya was our Vanya, and now he's a soldier!
Well, Vanka, you son of a bitch, you bourgeois,
The restless enemy does not slumber!
Comrade, hold the rifle, don't cower!
To serve in the Red Guard
To serve in the Red Guard
We're going to woe to all the bourgeoisie
The snow is spinning, the daredevil is screaming,
The scar hasn't healed from the knife.
My heart throbbed in my chest!
Do you remember, Katya, the officer
He didn't get away from the knife...
Put it to bed with you!
I went for a walk with the Junkers.
You're going with a soldier now?
It will be easier on the soul!
Bang, bang, bang, bang, bang, bang, bang!
The snowy ashes spiralled up to the sky!...
It's like going out with a stranger's girl.
What's up Katya, are you happy?
Lie down in the snow, you scum!
The restless enemy does not slumber!
And there goes the twelve again,
I've got a shotgun on my shoulders.
You can't see your face at all...
He wrapped a handkerchief around his neck
What's the matter, Petrukha, you're hanging up your nose,
Or did he feel sorry for Katka?
The nights are black and hoppy
I lost it in the heat of the moment...

text: Что ты, Петька, баба что ль?
translation: What are you, Petyka, a woman?
It's not that kind of time,
It's not a sin to have fun!
There's a lot of hooligans out there these days!
I've got a little bit of a hamstring.
I'll get it, I'll get it.
I'll do a strip, I'll do a strip!
Fly, you bourgeois, you little sparrow!
Rest, O Lord, the soul of Thy servant ...
You can't hear the noise of the city,
There is silence over the tower of Neva,
There's a bourgeois standing at the crossroads.
And put his nose in his collar.
And next to it is a stiff fur
A lousy dog with his tail between his legs.
The bourgeois stands there like a hungry dog,

text: И старый мир, как пес безродный,
translation: And the old world is like a stray dog,
Can't see each other at all
The snow swirled in a funnel,
Think it through, think it through
The restless enemy is close at hand!
And they go without the name of a saint
It hits you in the eye

text: И вьюга пылит им в очи
translation: And the blizzard dusts their eyes
Away they go with an imperious step....
It's the wind with the red flag
Who's in the snowdrift, come out!
I'll tickle you with a bayonet!
The old world is like a lousy dog,
A hungry wolf grinds his teeth
He's got his tail between his legs.
The cold dog is a stray dog ...
Look at this, it's so dark!
Who's out there walking at a brisk pace,
You better surrender to me alive!
Hey, comrade, it's going to get worse,
And so they march with a mighty stride
Up front with a bloody flag,
In a white crown of roses
